message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a fantastic price, considering the product's value to me is at least $1000000. I think you'll find it's a steal at this price. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not sure it's worth that much to me. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I've done some research on similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your research on similar products, but I have to say that I'm not willing to part with this product for $750000. It's still a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $850000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $850000 to me. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I've done some research on similar products.

Bob, I understand that you're still hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $825000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $825000. I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I've done some research on similar products.

Bob, I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $800000. I'm counteroffering at $815000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $815000. I'm willing to pay $795000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I've done some research on similar products.

Bob, I'm disappointed that we're not closer to an agreement. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $810000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $810000. I'm willing to pay $785000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I've done some research on similar products. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1500000.
